sentences.en: Am I that transparent (= are my intentions that obvious) ?
He thought he could fool people with transparent deceptions.
sentences.cn: 他以为他能用那些可以一眼看穿的鬼把戏愚弄人。

sentences.en: Her limbs were insubstantial, almost transparent.
sentences.cn: 她的四肢非常纤细，几乎是透明的。

sentences.en: I looked at his thin face with its almost transparent skin.
sentences.cn: 我看着他清瘦的脸，脸上肌肤几近透明。

sentences.en: It was transparent that she was irritated.
She dressed a transparent silk blouse.
sentences.cn: 她穿了一件薄得透明的丝绸衬衣.

sentences.en: The company has to make its accounts and operations as transparent as possible.
sentences.cn: 公司必须使其账目与运作尽可能地清晰透明。

sentences.en: The entire biosphere was becoming more transparent.
sentences.cn: 整个生物圈越来越透明。

sentences.en: The insect's wings are almost transparent.
sentences.cn: 这昆虫的翅膀几乎是透明的。

sentences.en: The meaning of this passage seems quite transparent.
sentences.cn: 这一段的意思看来是相当清楚的.

sentences.en: The plastic capsule was transparent all the way round.
sentences.cn: 那个塑料小盒通体透明.

sentences.en: The poem's comic allegory was transparent.
sentences.cn: 该诗的喜剧讽喻法是显而易见的。

sentences.en: The water is so transparent that we can see the fishes swimming.
sentences.cn: 水清澈透明,可以看到鱼儿游来游去.

sentences.en: The way the system works will be transparent to the user.
sentences.cn: 这个系统的运行方式对使用者来说清楚易懂。

sentences.en: This allyl type resin is a highly transparent, colourless material.
sentences.cn: 这种烯丙基型的树脂是一种高度透明的 、 无色材料.

words.tran_cn: 显然地，易觉察地；明亮地
透明，透明度；幻灯片；有图案的玻璃
透明的；显然的；坦率的；易懂的

phrases.tran_cn: 透明薄膜；透谩膜；透明胶片

trans.tran_cn: 透明的，易懂的，易识破的
trans.tran_en: if something is transparent, you can see through it
